comprehensive_overview: LD Score Regression (LDSC) is a computational tool used for estimating heritability from summary statistics of genome-wide association studies (GWAS). It leverages linkage disequilibrium information from reference populations to estimate genetic correlations among different traits or diseases.
core_features:
1. Estimating heritability from GWAS summary statistics
2. Estimating genetic correlations among traits or diseases
3. Utilizing linkage disequilibrium information from reference panels
4. Conducting partitioned heritability analysis
5. Performing LD score regression analysis
